name: MotivationalQuoteoftheDay

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: motivational quote of the day
Developer Terms of Use
des: Whether you’re looking for a positive thought to start your day, or need an afternoon boost, YourDictionary’s Motivational Quote of the Day is here with that little extra encouragement you need. With daily quotes from forward thinkers like Albert Einstein and Steve Jobs, world leaders including Ronald Reagan and Winston Churchill, pop culture icons like Muhammad Ali and Taylor Swift, and many more. Check back every day for a new inspirational quote to help you make the most out of your day!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
